name: Jura
description:
✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:*  JURA  *:･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧

Jura knew very well that once you leave the Moon - where all hares should spend their eternity, laughing and partying - you can’t go back. Between Jura and the Moon lies a haunted castle so high and narrow that no adventurous soul ever managed to escape.
／(^ × ^)＼
